trans-unit.source: Use the `GetFrameworkSdkPath` element in your project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o `GetFrameworkSdkPath` elemento no ficheiro do projeto para criar e executar esta tarefa.

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [GetFrameworkSdkPath Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para informações de utilização e o parâmetro, consulte [GetFrameworkSdkPath tarefa](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GetFrameworkSdkPath"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GetFrameworkSdkPath"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: There is no execution that takes place for the `GetFrameworkSdkPath` task, instead the task supports only getting and setting of properties.
trans-unit.target: Não existe nenhum execução que decorre para o `GetFrameworkSdkPath` tarefa, em vez disso, a tarefa suporta apenas a receber e a definição das propriedades.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 SDK.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caminho para o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 SDK.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 SDK.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caminho para o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3,5 SDK.

trans-unit.source: The path to the v4.0 .NET SDK if it could be found.
trans-unit.target: O caminho para o v&4;.0 SDK do .NET se foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: It will be String.Empty if the SDK was not found.
trans-unit.target: Será String.Empty se o SDK não foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: The path to the v4.5 .NET SDK if it could be found.
trans-unit.target: O caminho para o&4;.5 SDK do .NET se foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: It will be String.Empty if the SDK was not found.
trans-unit.target: Será String.Empty se o SDK não foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to the latest version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caminho para a versão mais recente do [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK.

trans-unit.source: The path to the latest version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK.
trans-unit.target: O caminho para a versão mais recente do [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK.
